title: When repairs are allowed in the setback/widening of the road portion only then, Standing Committee shall be intimated as per the section 297(3) of MMC Act
clause_text: When repairs are allowed in the setback/widening of the road portion only then, Standing Committee shall be intimated as per the section 297(3) of MMC Act.
